products.title: Our Products!
products.cardStudentDescription: Enjoy an accessible credit limit with no fees and exclusive discounts at your favorite places, from bookstores to caf√©s. Manage your money freely and save while studying.
products.cardPlusDescription: Make every purchase count: earn points with every purchase and redeem them for incredible exclusive benefits. Plus, enjoy special promotions to save on your favorite items.
products.cardPremiumDescription: Enjoy exclusive benefits, a high credit limit, and rewards tailored to your lifestyle. The ideal card for those seeking more and better.

home.texto1: From opening your first account to financing your big projects, we are here to help you move forward.
home.texto2: Secure, easy, and tailored banking for you.
home.solicitaTarjeta: Request your credit card with competitive rates and exclusive benefits.
home.revisaCuotas: Review and manage your mortgage loans with flexible payment options.
home.invierteFuturo: Plan your future investments with personalized advice and advanced tools.
home.imagenAlt: Happy person with their bank card

valores.misionTexto: Our mission is to provide financial services that empower people to achieve their goals.
valores.visionTexto: To be the most trusted and sustainable bank, leading innovation in financial services.

nosotros.descripcion: Banco Centauros is a financial institution committed to excellence and customer service.
nosotros.historiaTexto: With over 20 years of experience, we have been pioneers in innovative financial solutions.
nosotros.quienesSomosTexto: We are a team dedicated to providing personalized and effective financial solutions.
